docs.title: About
docs.text:
Open, privacy-first IoT projects

Welcome to the documentation for userowniot – technical solutions for smart homes and IoT, where the main principle is that the owner of the data is always the user.

Note

This site is generated using MkDocs Material.

docs.title: Philosophy
docs.text:
Our goal is to create devices and software that:

  • 🔐 Protect privacy – all data stays local unless the user chooses otherwise
  • 🛠 Are open – hardware and software are documented and modifiable
  • 🌍 Prefer European components – to reduce dependence on non-European suppliers

Tip

Your data, your hardware, your decision.

docs.title: Projects
docs.text:
Here you will find examples of current and upcoming projects:

  • 🌀 ESP32/ESPHome modules for Home Assistant
  • 📡 STM32WB Zigbee devices with full local control
  • ⚙ Open-source PCB designs available on GitHub
